name: Chrome Dino in Construct 3 :D
description: Good morning, afternoon or evening Internet users, first of all I give credits to google for the chrome dino assets and some sounds. secondly I give the information that the game was made in the construct 3 engine. Thirdly, I give the information that the game was made by skeblox as a prototype and also as a fangame and that it is not finished nor does it have any profit for the creator. and lastly I give the game controls: -jump with the up arrow or the w -double jump by pressing the up arrow or w twice -crouch with the down arrow or the s (clarification: you can't keep crouching)
